external_games.name: Kim Possible: A Sitch in Time - Episode 1: Present

name: Kim Possible: A Sitch in Time - Episode 1: Present
summary: Start a new adventure while playing Kim Possible - A Sitch in Time Episode 1: Present game! Kim is a high school student who not only has excellent grades but is also a hero fighting crime and villains such as Monkey Fist. In this game, you need to help Kim stop Monkey fist from assembling the Tempus Simia Idol. Accomplish this by navigating her up and over various obstacles.
